description: Upload a new blob, to be referenced from a repository record. The blob will be deleted if it is not referenced within a time window (eg, minutes). Blob restrictions (mimetype, size, etc) are enforced when the reference is created. Requires auth, implemented by PDS.

main.description: Upload a new blob, to be referenced from a repository record. The blob will be deleted if it is not referenced within a time window (eg, minutes). Blob restrictions (mimetype, size, etc) are enforced when the reference is created.

repo.description: The handle or DID of the repo (aka, current account).

space.description: The id of the context space to operate under.
